publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4086 John Farquhar Munro: Scotland’s Return to the EU Beef Market—That the Parliament welcomes the return of Scottish beef to the European market; recognises that this was a result of concerted co-operation between British and Scottish Ministers and the National Farmers’ Union; believes that this was assisted by Scotland’s reputation for producing the best quality beef, and urges the industry and the Scottish Executive to co-operate in spearheading a marketing drive.

S2M-4086 John Farquhar Munro: Scotland’s Return to the EU Beef Market—That the Parliament welcomes the return of Scottish beef to the European market; recognises that this was a result of concerted co-operation between British and Scottish Ministers and the National Farmers’ Union; believes that this was assisted by Scotland’s reputation for producing the best quality beef, and urges the industry and the Scottish Executive to co-operate in spearheading a marketing drive.
S2M-4086 Scotland’s Return to the EU Beef Market (lodged on 8 March 2006) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4086 Scotland’s Return to the EU Beef Market (lodged on 8 March 2006) Nora Radcliffe*, Iain Smith*
S2M-4086 Scotland’s Return to the EU Beef Market (lodged on 8 March 2006) John Swinburne*
